EmailTemplate.name: 9/10/2014 - Peak10.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Register to Win a Dronecopter | Public, Private, & Hybrid Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Public, Private, & Hybrid: Lessons for Scaling from a Leading Cloud Provider <http://go.vmturbo.com/registration-peak10-webinar.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=peak10090514> Clouds: How to Build, How to Scale <http://go.vmturbo.com/registration-peak10-webinar.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=peak10090514> Peak 10 provides Enterprise Public, Private, Hybrid and Recovery Cloud solutions. Properly configuring resources – in both provisioning and allocation decisions – is paramount to not only minimizing Peak 10’s costs, but also to delivering the best possible service to customers. Some customers strike the perfect configuration, others drastically over provision. Peak 10 leverages VMTurbo Operations Manager to control the thousands of VMs in its Enterprise Public Cloud environments – ensuring that applications are performant while utilizing their cloud as efficiently as possible.
Join this joint webinar on Wednesday, September 10 for a chance to win a Hubsan X4 Quadcopter Drone! Register Now <http://go.vmturbo.com/registration-peak10-webinar.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=peak10090514> Downloads White Papers Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
